ISSUE.TITLE: Twitter logo may be need to update as new 'X' logo
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: # Bug report <!-- --> - [x] I confirm this is a bug with Supabase, not with my own application. - [x] I confirm I have searched the [Docs](https://docs.supabase.com), GitHub [Discussions](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/discussions), and [Discord](https://discord.supabase.com). ## Describe the bug On July 23, 2023, the social media platform twitter has been updated their logo in new abstract 'X' shape after that most of online site who used Twitter traditional bird logo they have changed their logo to new 'X' shape but superbase did not update it yet. I think that is important to aware them about this. ## To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior, please provide code snippets or a repository: 1. Go to 'https://supabase.com/' 2. In home page Scroll down to 'Join the community' 3. You can see the old bird logo with People Avatar 4. You can find the similar issue in footer icon. ## Expected behavior ![image](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/60088050/bd0e4e19-866f-482d-823c-fbea49cd8889) ## Screenshots ![image](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/60088050/a904917d-bfdb-4817-a1b0-053c8903b0f8) ![image](https://github.com/supabase/supabase/assets/60088050/b34c5ee2-aaf0-4a71-a3ab-18a94bd547f4) ## Additional context It's also important to regularly update the site frontend as well as backend.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #16705 from supabase/chore/blog-categories Blog categories

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #16688 from AbhijeetBiswalCodes/twitter-logo-update-to-x Twitter logo updated as new 'X' logo #16671
